name: Paul Newman and his Movies Online Quiz | People Themed | 10 Questions

options: Life and Times of Judge Roy Bean

questions.text: In which movie did Newman re-create his role of detective Lew Harper (which he played in the movie 'Harper')?
Newman starred in which Hitchcock movie?
Which of these movies was based on a real person?
options: The Private War of Harry Frigg
questions.explanation:
Somebody Up There Likes Me.

	It was the story of boxer Rocky Graziano.

questions.text: Newman's female lead in 'The Prize' was ________ .
Newman played in Tennessee Williams' 'Cat on a Hot Tin Roof'. What other Williams piece was he in?
Which of these movies did NOT include Joanne Woodward?
questions.explanation:
The Hustler.

	'The Hustler' was with Piper Laurie.

questions.text: Which of these movies did NOT involve a trial as a key part of the story?
Which of these movies is NOT a Comedy?
questions.explanation:
The Towering Inferno.

	It was a 'disaster' movie - in many ways.

questions.text: In which of these movies did Newman NOT die at the end?
